diffStyleForTextFiles.description:
Diff view style for text files (html, xml, latex, markdown, etc.). Choices are:
  • line diff: no highlighting within diffs;
  • inner line diff: if lines have not been added but just modified, highlight the text range from the first to the last modification within the diff;
  • word diff: highlight the words that have been modified within each diff.
    • inner line diff should be better for source code files, while word diff is more suitable for text files (documents)

diffStyleForSourceFiles.description: Diff view style for source code files (same choices as above)

textFileGrammarList.description:
comma-separated list of grammar scope names, used by inline-git-diff to distinguish text files (documents) from source code files and apply different diff view styles accordingly (see the options above). You can use '*' as wildcard.
Default values should cover any plain text, asciidoc, markdown, html, latex, reStructuredText and xml files.
More info on Atom's grammar scope names at https://atom.io/packages/file-types

useGitCommandToCalculateDiff.description: use git command to calculate diffs, in order to enable the options below (requires git)

maxCommitsToShowInGitHistory.description: max number of commits to show in the git history prompt (where you can choose the commit against which to compare the current buffer text)

preselectLastCommitFromCurrentGitUser.description: preselect last commit from the current git user (instead of the last commit) in the git history prompt

diffAlgorithm.description: algorithm to be used by git command to calculate diffs
